newsitem.title: IRAQ: Iraq helicopters arrive safely to pick up pilgrims.
newsitem.headline: Iraq helicopters arrive safely to pick up pilgrims.

text.p: Iraqi helicopters arrived safely at Iraq's southern border with Saudi Arabia to pick up Moslem pilgrims, the official Iraqi News Agency (INA) said on Tuesday.

"INA has learned that a number of helicopters were sent yesterday and this morning to the border area of Arar to tranfer Iraqi pilgrims from the city of Arar to all provinces in the country," the agency said. "The helicopters landed safely at the border post."
